original_text: I know that God took this man up to paradise. I do not know whether this man was still in his body or not. Only God knows. When this man was in heaven, he heard about secret things. Those are things that no words can describe. God will not let any person speak about those things. They are too special.
korean_text: 그가 낙원으로 이끌려 가서 말로 표현할 수 없는 말을 들었으니 사람이 가히 이르지 못할 말이로다

sentences.original_text: I know that God took this man up to paradise.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 이 사람을 천국으로 데려가신 것을 나는 압니다.

sentences.original_text: whether this man was still in his body or not.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람이 여전히 자신의 몸 안에 있었는지 아닌지를.

sentences.original_text: When this man was in heaven,
God will not let any person
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 어떤 사람도 허락하지 않으실 것입니다.
